title: How to Make an Airsoft Grenade

steps.title: Open a regular plastic Easter egg.
steps.content: Open a regular plastic Easter egg.

steps.title: Drill or cut out the little hole in the bottom.
steps.content: Drill or cut out the little hole in the bottom.

steps.title: Insert a firecracker (types may vary), and stick the wick out of the hole (M90's are cheap, small, and very powerful).
steps.content: Insert a firecracker (types may vary), and stick the wick out of the hole (M90's are cheap, small, and very powerful). Be sure to make the wick long enough for someone to be able to get away in time.

steps.title: Fill the grenade with some inexpensive or cheap 6mm plastic BBs.
steps.content: Fill the grenade with some inexpensive or cheap 6mm plastic BBs.

steps.title: Close the Easter egg.
steps.content: Close the Easter egg.

steps.title: Light the fuse carefully.
steps.content: Light the fuse carefully.

steps.title: Throw the egg at the target.
steps.content: Throw the egg at the target.

steps.title: Obtain some cheap water balloons, and some cheap BBs.
steps.content: Obtain some cheap water balloons, and some cheap BBs.

steps.title: Use a speed loader to load about 50 BBs into the balloon.
steps.content: Use a speed loader to load about 50 BBs into the balloon.

steps.title: Push the BBs down to the bottom of the balloon when you have filled it.
steps.content: Push the BBs down to the bottom of the balloon when you have filled it.

steps.title: Blow the balloon up to the size of a human fist.
steps.content: Blow the balloon up to the size of a human fist. Add about 10 mm of water

steps.title: This balloon will shatter on impact
steps.content: This balloon will shatter on impact

steps.title: Add another 50 BBs and do the same thing.
steps.content: Add another 50 BBs and do the same thing.

steps.title: Obtain two film canisters but take away the caps of the canister.
steps.content: Obtain two film canisters but take away the caps of the canister.

steps.title: Fill the canisters halfway with 6mm plastic BBs.
steps.content: Fill the canisters halfway with 6mm plastic BBs.

steps.title: Stretch a rubber band around the two canisters.
steps.content: Stretch a rubber band around the two canisters.

steps.title: Slide a piece of cardboard in between the canisters.
steps.content: Slide a piece of cardboard in between the canisters.

steps.title: Take out the cardboard.
steps.content: Take out the cardboard.

steps.title: Throw the canisters at the target.
steps.content: Throw the canisters at the target.

steps.title: Get a Ping Pong ball and some BB's
steps.content: Get a Ping Pong ball and some BB's

steps.title: Cut a small rectangle about the length of the tip of your finger out of the ball
steps.content: Cut a small rectangle about the length of the tip of your finger out of the ball

steps.title: Fill the ball up with as many BB's as desired
steps.content: Fill the ball up with as many BB's as desired

steps.title: Put a piece of tape over the hole so the BB's do not fall out in your pocket
steps.content: Put a piece of tape over the hole so the BB's do not fall out in your pocket

steps.title: When ready to throw, take tape off and cover with your finger, throw side-armed over target(s) You can also do this with paper if you can end up making the ball
steps.content: When ready to throw, take tape off and cover with your finger, throw side-armed over target(s) You can also do this with paper if you can end up making the ball

steps.title: Find a used shotgun shell or chapstick and fill it about halfway with dirt.
steps.content: Find a used shotgun shell or chapstick and fill it about halfway with dirt. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Put a green fuse firecracker in and fill the rest of the shell with dirt.
steps.content: Put a green fuse firecracker in and fill the rest of the shell with dirt. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Put a small hole in a piece of paper and put the fuse though the hole.
steps.content: Put a small hole in a piece of paper and put the fuse though the hole.

steps.title: Secure the paper with rubber bands.
steps.content: Secure the paper with rubber bands.

steps.title: Get a sheet of paper and make an origami water bomb.
steps.content: Get a sheet of paper and make an origami water bomb.

steps.title: Use a speed loader or funnel and load it to about three fourths capacity with plastic 6mm BBs.
steps.content: Use a speed loader or funnel and load it to about three fourths capacity with plastic 6mm BBs.

steps.title: Take a GREEN fused firecracker and place it in the water bomb's hole fuse side up (or use a bottle rocket with the stick removed).
steps.content: Take a GREEN fused firecracker and place it in the water bomb's hole fuse side up (or use a bottle rocket with the stick removed).

steps.title: Place the rocket fuse side up through the water bomb's hole in the top.
steps.content: Place the rocket fuse side up through the water bomb's hole in the top.

steps.title: Be very careful with it.
steps.content: Be very careful with it. The explosion CAN set the paper on fire.

steps.title: (NOTE:
steps.content: (NOTE: Don't use too strong of an explosive, make sure it can't do any serious damage if something goes wrong)

steps.title: Take a plastic sandwich bag, and fill about 1/3 with vinegar.
steps.content: Take a plastic sandwich bag, and fill about 1/3 with vinegar. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Place 6mm BB's into the vinegar
steps.content: Place 6mm BB's into the vinegar

steps.title: Take a tissue or paper towel and shake some baking soda (not baking powder) and fold the tissue or paper towel to completely surround the baking soda
steps.content: Take a tissue or paper towel and shake some baking soda (not baking powder) and fold the tissue or paper towel to completely surround the baking soda

steps.title: Place the baking soda filled tissue or paper towel in the bag do not let the tissue or paper towel touch the vinegar until you are ready to throw the grenade
steps.content: Place the baking soda filled tissue or paper towel in the bag do not let the tissue or paper towel touch the vinegar until you are ready to throw the grenade

steps.title: When you are ready to throw the grenade let the tissue or paper towel to make contact with the vinegar once the vinegar makes contact with the baking soda a gas will be released causing the bag to expand so once it hits a solid object it will blow up.
steps.content: When you are ready to throw the grenade let the tissue or paper towel to make contact with the vinegar once the vinegar makes contact with the baking soda a gas will be released causing the bag to expand so once it hits a solid object it will blow up. [4] X Research source

steps.title: NOTE:
steps.content: NOTE: The Bag must be firmly closed otherwise the gas will escape from the bag making the grenade useless
